    WConfirmExitForm

    WYSIWYG DMS Message Editor Controller for handling exchanges between the editor GUI form and the renderer.

    WEditorKeyBindings - Contains an InputMap and ActionMap that together implement all editor-focused key bindings in the WYSIWYG DMS Editor.

    ComboBox containing graphics for use in the WYSIWYG DMS Message Editor.
